```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

df <- data.frame(lat=runif(20, min=33.8, max=33.9),
                 lng=runif(20, min=-84.1, max=-84.0))
                 
                 
my_map <- df %>%
    leaflet() %>%
    addMarkers() %>%
    addTiles()
 
my_map

```
